body:
The test suite shows deprecation warnings about datetime.datetime.utcnow() being deprecated. Replace with datetime.now(datetime.UTC) for timezone-aware UTC datetime.

Location: scripts/triage_runner.py:280

Warning: DeprecationWarning: datetime.datetime.utcnow() is deprecated and scheduled for removal in a future version. Use timezone-aware objects to represent datetimes in UTC: datetime.datetime.now(datetime.UTC).
title: Fix deprecation warnings for datetime.utcnow()
